validators.doc_description: This field will only accept numerical values.

validators.description: This expression only allows for general string values (Must begin with a letter/underscore and must not contain special characters.
validators.doc_description: This field will only accept String values.

preprocessors.description: This preprocessor will do nothing to the original value. It is a direct processing
preprocessors.doc_description: Nothing will happen to the original data.

preprocessors.description: This preprocessor will match the original value with it's numeric mapping in the database for this attribute
preprocessors.doc_description: The data for this field will be looked up on our database.
preprocessors.preprocessor_script: const RunAsync = async () => {result = await DBLookup(field, input_data, model)}; RunAsync()

preprocessors.description: This preprocessor will calculate the age of a person based on their birth date
preprocessors.doc_description: We will calculate the age of the patient based on the birthdate provided

preprocessors.description: This preprocessor will calculate the amount of seconds based on the time of day given a date
preprocessors.doc_description: We will calculate the ammount of seconds of the day based on the given date.

preprocessors.description: This preprocessor will convert days into seconds
preprocessors.doc_description: We will calculate the number of seconds based on the number of days provided.
